Feeling tired himself, Tucson heaves a quiet sigh and takes a deep breath. =
 He then shifts an optic in the direction of the voice.

" No, I assure you=
 I'm a bit rare for my breed.  By the way, thank you.  If you had not been =
here I would not have escaped them. "

He slowly rises onto his feet.

" Th=
e Dinobots were never too sociable but, they never laid harm on an Autobot =
or Maximal.  I know they've been altered but I'm not sure as to who altered=
 them."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 6, 2011, at =
12:21 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> =
> Tucson hears the voice and immediately stops moving. It made sense,
> > s=
ometimes it was far better not to move then to run. He was also losing
> > =
energy rather quickly and felt the need to conserve it.
> >
> > He lies dow=
n on his belly, with his neck down on the ground and tail coiled
> > tightl=
y around his feet. Wings are tucked tightly against his body to
> > conceal=
 himself in the vegetation.
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> There was a moment of near sile=
nce as GRIMLOCK shifted into beast mode
> and sniffed the air, his head tur=
ning one way and then the other, his
> keen senses looking for the slightes=
t scent of something. Nothing
> moved but the breezes, even the sounds of t=
he animals had stopped.
> 
> He tilted his head finally as if finally caugh=
t the scent, and with
> one of his dimuniative arms he pointed, "There!" he=
 said with an eager
> finality. "Get him!"
> 
> All four of the transmetal =
dinosaurs run at the scent GRIMLOCK picked
> up, running away from TUSCON a=
nd down the path he had come!
> 
> "There." the voice said by TUSCON's ear,=
 this time the voice sounded
> tired and worn. "I hope your friends do not =
posses the hubris that you
> do." There is another feeling of strange breez=
es and energy and then
> the world seemed to shift back into focus.
> 
> GR=
IMLOCK and his team were gone, the sound of them moving through the
> folia=
ge could be heard moving away.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>
